channel.title: Bluur's Client
channel.description: I just recently downloaded PvP-Corruption from R00n-Serba and they said to follow a certain tutorial to allow Bluur's Client to work with it, but the tutorial was removed. So, can anyone tell me what to do to allow it to connect? When I try to login, it loads, but then it logs out real quick, and then says 'Error connecting to server.' Any help is greatly appreciated, will rep.

item.title: Bluur's Client
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

I just recently downloaded PvP-Corruption from R00n-Serba and they said to follow a certain tutorial to allow Bluur’s Client to work with it, but the tutorial was removed. So, can anyone tell me what to do to allow it to connect? When I try to login, it loads, but then it logs out real quick, and then says ‘Error connecting to server.’ Any help is greatly appreciated, will rep.
